description: First differences of odd split numbers (A036382).
comments: The large local maxima are near powers of 2. Compare the differences of connected numbers (A036379).Densities of connected (A029827) and split (A036382) numbers seem to behave in opposite way: where connected are dense, split ones are rare and vice versa.
example: 177,183,189,195,203,217,259,261 are successive odd split numbers. So their difference sequence is 6,6,6,8,14,42 and 2.
author: _Labos Elemer_
